info.name: Firefox - Menu Icons
info.description:
Adds icons within Firefox to AppMenu, MenuBar, File, Edit, View, Bookmarks, History, Tools, Help, Tab, Library, Download Manager, Add-ons Manager, Text Field, Context menus.
No External icons/images, Uses images only within Firefox.
Iconizes MenuBar (No Text).
info.additionalInfo:
Compatibility: Tested on Windows 7, Firefox 11, Default Theme. Might work on other OS (Doesn't work in Mac OS).

Known Bugs: None

To Do: Nothing to do. Any suggestions?

Update 27/03/2012:
- Fixed Radio Button; Thanks to user 7993.
- Fixed missing Inspect, Style Editor icons.
- Compatibility with Firefox 11.0.

Update 17/01/2012:
- Compatibility with Firefox 9.0, dropped support for previous versions.
- Fixed missing Inspect, Open Link, Stop icons.

Update 08/09/2011:
- Added missing Unsorted Bookmarks (in Menu Bar's Bookmarks Menu) Scratchpad, Get More Tools icons. Thanks again user 88331.
- Dropped version number; UI isn't changing as much as it did before Firefox's new rapid release cycle.

Update 26/04/2011:
- Added Search bar missing context menu icons. Thanks user 88331

Update 24/03/2011:
- Added Gray scale icons for disabled menu items.
- Added Download Manager & Add-ons Manager menu icons.

Update 19/03/2011:
- Fixed AppMenu icons.
- Added Library menu icons (Bookmarks/History Sidebar).
- Added/Changed some icons.
- Added Compatibility with with Firefox 4.0 RC2.

Update 19/01/2011:
- Fixed Menu's Arrow alignment.

Update 18/01/2011:
- Fixed enabled Checkboxes to view Checkmarks.
- Added/Changed some icons.
- Added Compatibility with with Firefox 4.0 Beta 9.

Update 25/12/2010:
- Added/Changed some icons.
- Added Compatibility with with Firefox 4.0 Beta 8.

Credits:
Thanks to user 552 & user 25760 for helping me.
